title: Meraki: A Syren Story
description: Synopsis:Her song is a gift bestowed by the gods; so why does it feel like a curse?Seventeen-year-old Wren thinks she has just swum away from the greatest threat in the sea. That's until she finds herself being hauled upon a warlord's boat. With her life at the mercy of a young, temperamental King, Wren must decide who is her ultimate enemy.Can Fate be altered? What do gods have planned?Syrens are bound to tell the truth, but that doesnâ€™t mean their lives cannot be riddled with lies.
author: Naomi Kelly
